Articles.Content: IVA re-entrys are cool as ..... But i feel like they can be made even more imersive. More shaking, alarms going off etc. I dont know if anyone have tried an IVA re-entry, try it out, preferably with the UI hidden so you only got the instruments in the cockpit to use. Its actually pretty cool. If anyone would be up to increasing this immersion with more shaking, and alarms etc. that would be awesome!

Have you heard the good news of [RasterPropMonitor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117471-1-0-RasterPropMonitor-still-putting-the-A-in-IVA)? No extra alarms, but you get lots of informative screens and multi-functional displays.

Try IVA landing for extra extra fun. And, yes, Raster Prop Monitor is what you're after.

> 
> Having recently managed my first IVA docking...
> 
> [![screenshot362_zpsb9ae7ba5.png](http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah120/craigmotbey/Kerbal/Kerbodyne%2025/Kerbodyne%20Nova/screenshot362_zpsb9ae7ba5.png)](http://s1378.photobucket.com/user/craigmotbey/media/Kerbal/Kerbodyne%2025/Kerbodyne%20Nova/screenshot362_zpsb9ae7ba5.png.html)
